post.title: Stuck @ SEATAC…Like Everyone Else
post.content: Like alot of other people, I’m stuck trying to get to LA for PDC. PDC + USC/UW game yesterday + fires closing LAX have screwed everything up royally. They just made an announcement for a flight into Ontario that is in final boarding, so maybe that’s a good sign that my flight that was supposed to leave 15 minutes ago will go soon. Seen a couple of ‘softies, including my boss’s boss’s boss Eric Rudder. He’s on standby for my flight. Thought I saw Brad Merrill waiting in Alaska Airlines customer service line (which is about 2 miles long).
